title: Transformative Play-Based Educational Design through Video Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language instruction experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Current elementary teachers focus on acquiring creative language teaching methods through game-based activities and strengthening learner-centered problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three language education scenarios applying transformative play theory.
Learners execute at least two collaborative problem-solving strategies while performing learner roles in game-based learning environments.
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in creating language education content through virtual world transformation activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
